channel.title: FTD Events on Fur Trade Days
channel.description: Recent content in FTD Events on Fur Trade Days

item.title: Forms
item.description: Entry forms, event signups, and posters will appear here.

item.title: Reunions
item.description: CHS Class of 1980, 40 year Reunion Rescheduled for this year due to COVID restrictions in 2020 Friday, Informal gathering at Holiday Inn Express, 6 p.m. Friday, Class photo, 7:30p.m. Friday evening, Social gathering Downtown Saturday, Class Float in Fur Trade Days Parade, 9:30 a.m., 10th & Main streets Saturday, Tour Chadron High schooll Saturday, Enjoy FTDs with family and friends Saturday evening, Social gathering downtown Check out the Class of 1980 Facebook Group or email Ann Hencey.

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Updated June 24, 2021 â€” Event times subject to change Thursday, July 8, 2021 All Day - Buckskinners primitive camp, open to visitors (3 Miles East, ~8 miles south from Museum of the Fur Trade) 5-10 p.m. - Mac’s Carnival (E 2nd & Bordeaux streets) 6-9 p.m. - Bands on Bordeaux - The Bar Flies (1st Street, between Main & Bordeaux streets) Friday, July 9, 2021 All Day - Buckskinners primitive camp, open to visitors (3 Miles East, ~8 miles south from Museum of the Fur Trade)
